markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shackleborn](/Feats.aspx?ID=2451) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 62 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your lineage shows the signs of [velstrac](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=111) tampering, including some curious quirk bequeathed by those shadowy surgeons of flesh and souls. Your flesh heals cleanly and quickly—all the better for you to serve as a subject for their ghastly art. You gain the [Fast Recovery](/Feats.aspx?ID=782) feat, even if you don't meet the prerequisites.

<title level="2">Shackleborn leads to...</title>
[Velstrac Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2456)
name: Shackleborn
